title: Recipe Rater
description: Analyzed a dataset of 234,429 recipe reviews from Food.com with 15 features and built a machine learning model to predict how highly a recipe will be rated (out of 5 stars). This project utilizes EDA, feature engineering, statistical hypothesis testing, and machine learning to develop a practical tool for smarter recipe selection.

title: Recipe Rater Report
description: In depth report of Recipe Rater project.

title: Amazon Inflation Analysis
description: Analyzed Amazon price trends from 2021–2024 and compared them with Consumer Price Index (CPI) data to evaluate how closely Amazon’s pricing aligns with inflation. Leveraged Keepa and BLS data using statistical testing and data visualization to uncover sector-specific patterns and pricing behaviors.

title: Deceptive vs Non-deceptive Visualizations
description: Visualized abortion access across U.S. states through both truthful and deceptive designs, critically exploring how small visual choices can dramatically alter public interpretation.

title: Address Book in C
description: A command-line address book written in C, this project showcases core concepts like dynamic memory allocation, linked lists, and file I/O. Users can add, edit, delete, sort, and persist contacts in a clean, CSV-based format.

title: Apple Quality Prediction Model
description: Explored various basic SKLearn models, predicted apple quality using Kaggle Dataset.

title: Cipher Suite
description: A classic cipher tool built in Python that lets you encrypt and decrypt messages using Caesar and Vigenère ciphers. Originally created in 2022 for my AP Computer Science Principles class.
